response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item carries a unique value that extends beyond its tangible attributes, offering unparalleled benefits and experiences to those who possess it. We are offering this exceptional piece at an exclusive price of $950,000. We believe this is an opportunity not only to acquire a valuable asset but also to join a distinguished group of individuals who appreciate and cherish such remarkable creations. Should you be interested in exploring further, please let us know, and we would be delighted to provide more details about the product and discuss how it could enhance your life or business.", "product_price": 950000}
